system.description:
Trigger: You are targeted by a Physical- or Special-Category Attack.
Effect: The user can freely move up to half of the Movement Score of their choice towards the target and then attacks with Upper Hand, if possible. If the target Faints due to damage from this move, the triggering attack fails.
